ModMetaData.name: Justin's Psyfocus
ModMetaData.author: Justiniankoi
ModMetaData.description: This mod makes psyfocus less annoying (generally buffed) Throne: base 0.4 was 0.15, impressiveness curve -0.1, 0.0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.6 was -0.05, 0.0, 0.04, 0.08, 0.10 Large Nature Shrine: 0.5 + 0.2 per animus was 0.3 + 0.02 per animus Small Nature Shrine: 0.4 + 0.1 per animus was 0.22 + 0.02 per animus Animus Stone: 0.4 + 0.1 per animus was 0.34 + 0.02 per animus Anima Tree: 0.5 + 0.25 per animus was 0.25 + 0.02 per animus Grave: 0.1 + 0.02 per empty + 0.02 per full + 0.3 if relation was 0.06 + 0.01 per empty + 0.01 per full + 0.1 if relation Sarcophagus: 0.2 + 0.02 per empty + 0.03 per full + 0.3 if relation was 0.1 + 0.01 per empty + 0.01 per full + 0.1 if relation Stele: base 0.3 was 0.15 Large Stele: base 0.35 was 0.18 Sculpture: curve 0.1, 0.15, 0.2, 0.25, 0.3, 0.4, 0.6 was 0.12, 0.16, .2, 0.22, 0.24, 0.26, 0.28, extra bonus per 0, 0, 0, 0.01, 0.02, 0.04, 0.07 was 0, 0, 0.01, 0.01, 0.01, 0.02, 0.02
